item.title: What does an overloaded system look like for humans? (Adobo & Avocados #08)
item.description: My friend Marie Cruz and I talk about burnout from a more technical point of view. We discuss how burnout is similar to an overloaded system (and how it isn’t), and we draw comparisons on how to make an overloaded system more resilient and recover from burnout.

item.title: When Productivity Gets Toxic, with Andy Polaine
item.description:
We usually see productivity as a positive thing, but what happens when productivity gets toxic? According to my friend Andy Polaine, design leadership coach, burnout can occur when you’ve been doing more than you used to, struggling with the work, and feeling like you can’t say anything to anyone. In this video, Andy shares some tips for setting up boundaries to create mental space and defending your calendar against external pressures.
